Description: Small knitted tube, the lower end ragged, the upper end cast off. All cotton white, pale brown, pink and pale blue. Design of multiple stripes, based on two wider decorated stripes, a - towards the top with double hooks in white on a blue ground and b - towards the bottom a more complex geometric figure, a stylised inscription or possibly two stylised birds joined back to back and head to tail in white on pink.
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
